Text:
mine wont let me use what program do i need to run it it says somthing is missing
thanks

try to install thees runtime files from microsoft.

http://support.microsoft.com/kb/192461

Direct link download : http://download.microsoft.com/download/vb60pro/install/6/win98me/en-us/vbrun60.exe
Most programs like this rely on direct MX. Almost all ISPs have disabled this capability, rendering such programs useless.

I f you want a bulk mailer go here http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5474634/Atomic_Mail_Sender_v5.10__amp__Email_Hunter_4.60_Portable
This is program is bullshit
Same problem. It relies on direct MX to send, which is disabled by most ISPs.
You have to send by SMTP only otherwise it  won't work, I'm using it and it work's fine
SO THIS WHERE THE SPAM COMES FROM..
